Subject: Hot heads in battle

From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod/Cleder/Rixer/Forrior/Blyer/Firearm::

He watched as Gemeni Dragon shots once more.
"Damn it, stop! Why do you all want to continue a pointless battle out
of confusion?"

Cleder spoke up.
"If this continues we will be forced to defend them. They are Maximals
after all."

"Lets get out of here," said Hot Rod.

They all transformed and headed back to Maximal City, with Train Wreck
and the others.
